name: Strangler Fig
description: An approach for incrementally decomposing a monolithic product by gradually replacing specific pieces of functionality.

name: Test-Driven Development (TDD)
description: Software requirements are captured in tests before the corresponding functionality is developed, and progress is tracked by repeatedly running the tests to assert the desired behaviour is being developed.

name: Agile
description: Uses an iterative approach, where teams deliver work in small increments of functional software and their requirements, plans, and results are evaluated continuously so they can iterate and improve.

name: Retrospective
description: Looking back on a period of time, learning from what did or didn't happen, and building an action plan for continuous improvement.
